mapper.insert: insert into tbl_client (fk_pNo, clientmobile, clientname, cnumber) values (#{fk_pNo}, #{clientmobile}, #{clientname}, #{cnumber})
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from tbl_client where fk_pNo=#{fk_pNo} and clientmobile=#{clientmobile}
select count(*) from tbl_client where clientmobile= #{clientmobile} and clientname=#{clientname}

select pNo, pName, startDate, endDate, period, price, clientname, clientmobile, cnumber from ( select rownum as rno, pNo, pName, startDate, endDate, period, price, clientname, clientmobile, cnumber from ( select pNo, pName, to_char(startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate, to_char(endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate, to_char(endDate-startdate) ||'박 '|| to_char(endDate-startdate+1) ||'일' as period, price, clientname, clientmobile, cnumber from tbl_product join tbl_client on pNo=fk_pNo where clientmobile=#{clientmobile} order by startDate desc ) V1 ) V2 where rno between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) as count from tbl_client where clientmobile=#{clientmobile}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_client where fk_pNo=#{fk_pNo} and clientmobile=#{clientmobile}
update tbl_client set cnumber= to_number(cnumber)+to_number(#{cnumber}) where fk_pNo=#{fk_pNo} and clientmobile=#{clientmobile}
